story:
Once upon a time, in the mystical land of ancient China, there lived a young and adventurous boy named Li Wei. Li Wei was known for his courage and kindness, always willing to help those in need.

One evening, as the sun began to set and the stars appeared in the sky like twinkling diamonds, Li Wei's grandmother told him a special story. She shared with him the tale of a magical dragon who guarded the village and protected its inhabitants from harm.

Li Wei's eyes widened with wonder as he listened to the story. His grandmother's voice was soft and soothing, like a gentle breeze rustling through the bamboo trees. She described how the dragon's scales shimmered in the moonlight and how its fiery breath lit up the night sky like a shooting star.

As Li Wei drifted off to sleep, he dreamed of embarking on a grand adventure with the dragon, soaring through the clouds and exploring the hidden wonders of the land. In his dream, he was a hero, brave and fearless, just like the dragon who watched over his village.

When Li Wei woke up the next morning, he felt a sense of newfound courage and determination. He knew that he could overcome any obstacle that came his way, just like the brave dragon in his grandmother's story.

And so, Li Wei continued to live his life with kindness and bravery, always remembering the tale of the magical dragon who taught him the true meaning of courage.

As you tuck your son into bed tonight, remember the story of Li Wei and the dragon, and remind him that with kindness and courage, he can achieve anything his heart desires. Goodnight, sweet dreams, and may the magical dragon always watch over him.
